meanings.definition: A building or structure used for the storage and distribution of gas.
meanings.sent1: The gashouse on the corner provides gas for the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: We walked past the gashouse on our way to the park.
meanings.sent3: The clown mistakenly thought the gashouse was a giant balloon.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a gashouse, storing memories and emotions.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned gashouse loomed in the distance, a silent sentinel of the past.

meanings.sent1: He learned how to gashouse efficiently to meet the demand.
meanings.sent2: The workers gashouse early in the morning to prepare for the day.
meanings.sent3: She tried to gashouse, but ended up causing a small explosion.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to gashouse emotions in everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The chef had to carefully gashouse the equipment to avoid any accidents.
